h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
content: Other attacks can include swipes with both hands that sweep side to side, so even if one hand swipes past, don’t get too confident in thinking the danger has passed in case another claw on the other side sweeps your way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Fuban'.
The content is as follows:
Other attacks can include swipes with both hands that sweep side to side, so even if one hand swipes past, don’t get too confident in thinking the danger has passed in case another claw on the other side sweeps your way.
